title: Your last played champion switches weapons with your favorite champions weapon.
body:
{{champion:268}} 's soldiers now shoot things with pistols.

{{champion:41}} now controls sand?

replies.body:
{{champion:113}} "Wtf do I do with this? Smack people with it?"
{{champion:37}} "..." *tries to pick up flail and falls* "..."
{{champion:113}} *Tries to play Etwhal* *horrid screeching noises ensue*
{{champion:37}} *slow clap*

Fiora: "Zis... Zis sword iz to heavy"
Leona: "This... This sword is too tiny"

Last played Kog
Favorite champion is Syndra

This just got weird.

o.O

Poor Syndra must be horribly ill to projectile vomit like that.

Last played: Amumu
Favorite: Shyvana

Shyv finally gets decent ganks! And Amumu both cries and is on fire... interesting

Considering my last played champion is my favorite so {{champion:102}}  switches weapons with {{champion:102}}  and nothing happens . . . . .I probably should have played another match before seeing this.
{{champion:53}} with {{champion:222}} and{{champion:254}} 's weapons... Talk about one hell of an OP champ!
Blitz won't look any different with Vi's weapons lol

Alistar: receives chains and a hook. Replace Ali's E with Thresh's Q. That would be amazing support.
Thresh: receives horns?
{{champion:5}} now has {{champion:16}} s staff and poor {{champion:16}}  has to learn to use a spear

{{champion:266}}  How do you yordles even fight with these gadets? seriously these are toys not weapons

{{champion:74}}  Yea well not everyones a mindless brute that can swing a sword! seriously i should reveal my existence to the work but you wont be cause youll be dead!

{{champion:266}} That is TOTALLY from BOONDOCK SAINTS
Loving the Boondock Saints and Hellsing Abridged references you just made.

{{champion:12}} Now has two tiny poison shivs.

 {{champion:35}} Now must strangle his enemies with his bare hands.

Huh...{{champion:80}} gets a staff and {{champion:62}} gets a spear. Not much changes really. Though someone will have to explain why Panth throwing staffs (staves?) at people will do as much damage as it does.

same goes for wu's ult not doing more damage with a spear. as for the staff doing the same damage, blunt trauma could potentially do just as much damage due to internal bleeding, making for a difficult fix for a doctor.
Yeah, but you can throw a spear more accurately than a staff...I think.
foxy ;3
{{champion:33}} Switches his...shell... with {{champion:27}} 's alchemic toxins. Rammus power balling with smoke sounds cool tho.

{{champion:40}} "What? Hey, gimme my staff back, no fair! You expect me to slap people to death or something?"
{{champion:28}} "Hmm, how can I abuse this thing? Meh, I'll probably end up pawning it."
